评论详情: These Hycredi sunglasses come in a pack of three. All three pairs are stylish, well-made, and comfortable to wear. Currently, Amazon has these Hycredi sunglasses listed for less than $15. That is less than $5 a pair for 100% UV 400 protection and stylish round-framed sunglasses in multiple colors.

This 3 pack of stylish sunglasses was a good value for the price.  Each pair comes with its own drawstring pouch to keep them scratch free when not in use.  The frames are stylish,  but the tints are just ok - one pair has a green cast, the other gray.  The yellow tinted sunglasses are not flattering.
